scenes.one_liner: Ela monitors eerie radio static alone on a moonlit deserted highway.
Ela deciphers urgent coordinates from Marcus’s faint radio distress inside tent.
Flashback: Marcus struggles inside damaged spacecraft amid sparking systems failure.
Sheriff Miller drives determinedly down Desolation Road toward crash coordinates.
Sheriff Miller and Ela arrive, aiding weakened Marcus at the crash site.
At dawn, Ela and Sheriff reflect quietly on Marcus’s survival.
